content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 56.6 - Retrofitted side steps on buses

State Regulations

Notwithstanding Part 43 of this Chapter, a bus to which a
step has been added to aid passengers in boarding or alighting from the
vehicle, and which step causes the bus to become 80 inches or more in width, need not be equipped with front or rear identification lamps or clearance
lamps, provided that: (a) the bus does
not exceed 84 inches in width; (b) attached to the step and facing oncoming traffic is a clear, white or colorless
class A reflex reflector of at least three square inches in size; and
(c) attached to the step and facing following
traffic is an amber class A reflex reflector of at least three square inches in
size. Notes
